column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The deep dish was the same as ever from there
column2: top notch.  Sadly the thin crust does not live up to some of the better thin crusts around
column3: like Pat's or Vito and Nick's.  If you have ever had either one of those thin crusts
column4: that is the gold standard as far as I think thin crust pizza should be.  The sausage thin crust from Lou's could have been more crispy
column5: a little thinner perhaps and for sure
